Question: Security in Restful web application in java: :I am working in restful web services . We are creating web services which is running in glassfish and we are calling these restful web services directly from our jsp deployed in tomcat . I have to make our web service secure such that no other person or organisation can hit(use) our web services from there application . Can you tell me how to do these ?????? 
Please using this api: StringTokenizer.nextToken.
Answer:
response:
StringTokenizer.nextToken() method is used to get the next token from the string.
